body:
<!--To help us understand and resolve your issue, please fill out the form to the best of your ability. Feel free to delete the sections that do not apply.-->

**Description of the problem**

The remote file example from the [grd2kml docs](https://docs.generic-mapping-tools.org/dev/grd2kml.html) successfully creates a quadtree in 6.1.1 but fails when built from the master branch.
<!-- Please be as detailed as you can when describing an issue. The more information we have, the easier it will be for us to track this down. -->

**Full script that generated the error**

<!-- It helps a lot if you share any data files required to run your script. You can drag-and-drop them here or paste a link to Dropbox/GoogleDrive/etc. -->

```
gmt grd2kml @earth_relief_06m -NEarth6m
```

**Full error message**

<!-- Tip: you'll get more detailed error messages if you add -Vd to your gmt commands. -->

```
grd2kml [WARNING]: Option -L: For global grids we select a tile size of 360
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Level = 00 tile size = 360d grid inc = 60m n_tiles = 1
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Level = 01 tile size = 180d grid inc = 30m n_tiles = 2
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Level = 02 tile size = 90d grid inc = 15m n_tiles = 4
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Level = 03 tile size = 45d grid inc = 7.5m n_tiles = 8
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Level = 04 tile size = 22.5d grid inc = 3.75m n_tiles = 16
grdcut [WARNING]: Expanded grid region implies the grid is no longer geographic
grd2kml [NOTICE]: Extended grid size is by 3600 by 3600, tile size is 360 x 360
ERROR: Caught signal number 11 (Segmentation fault: 11) at
0   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x0000000100a6ae41 GMT_grdimage + 15297
1   ???                                 0x0000000000000008 0x0 + 8
Stack backtrace:
0   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x000000010073c6a2 sig_handler + 594
1   libsystem_platform.dylib            0x00007fff20414d7d _sigtramp + 29
2   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x00000001007511e7 GMT_Read_Data + 4519
3   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x0000000100764d92 GMT_Call_Module + 2162
4   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x0000000100a2d9dc GMT_grd2kml + 12844
5   libgmt.6.dylib                      0x0000000100764d92 GMT_Call_Module + 2162
6   gmt                                 0x0000000100727573 main + 1459
7   libdyld.dylib                       0x00007fff203eaf3d start + 1
8   ???                                 0x0000000000000004 0x0 + 4
```

**Actual outcome**

A segfault.

**Expected outcome**

A quadtree of jpg images and kml wrappers.

**System information**

* Operating system: macOS Big Sur
* GMT version (`gmt --version`): 6.2.0_6b49122_2021.05.17

comments_content.body: Bug was introduced by this merge commit: https://github.com/GenericMappingTools/gmt/commit/bdc10af997d855450158be78caa2a6033ec5bfe3 (PR #4427)

title: grd2kml example seg faults in 6.2
